reviews.review: Короче говоря промывание мозгов для слабо слабоумных

its a nice game

Adding on too the review "its a nice game" which took me alot of effort and time to make , i'd like to say that csgo is still a very enjoiable game to play even though we all hate it from time too time. At least you can see that Valve made some efforts in the last weeks to reduce the cheating problem, when they removed that you can get prime without paying for it. To be fully satisfied with the game they would just have to update their server tick rate to 128 tick and make a more precises anti cheat but considering we are dealing with valve i am already quiet happy with the changes they did. Even if it would mean for me that i would have to open more of these 2.1euro cases to help get the server rate up and the anti cheat working better, i would be more then happy to do that as i realy enjoi the overall concept and how competetiv matchmaking is struktured in cs.
